mapper.sql: PKID, CASE_CODE, INCOME_CAT, INCOME_ITEM, INCOME_AMOUNT, IMPORT_TIME, IMPORT_NO, INCOME_BELONG_DAY, FIN_CASE_CODE, FIN_CODE, IS_CHANGE
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS (PKID, CASE_CODE, INCOME_CAT, INCOME_ITEM, INCOME_AMOUNT, IMPORT_TIME, IMPORT_NO, INCOME_BELONG_DAY, FIN_CASE_CODE, FIN_CODE, IS_CHANGE) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{importNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{incomeBelongDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finCaseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isChange,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into sctrans.T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS
PKID,
CASE_CODE,
INCOME_CAT,
INCOME_ITEM,
INCOME_AMOUNT,
IMPORT_TIME,
IMPORT_NO,
INCOME_BELONG_DAY,
FIN_CASE_CODE,
FIN_CODE,
IS_CHANGE,

#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{incomeCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{incomeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{incomeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOME_CAT = #{incomeCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOME_ITEM = #{incomeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOME_AMOUNT = #{incomeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IMPORT_NO = #{importNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INCOME_BELONG_DAY = #{incomeBelongDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FIN_CASE_CODE = #{finCaseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIN_CODE = #{finCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_CHANGE = #{isChange,jdbcType=CHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCOME_CAT = #{incomeCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCOME_ITEM = #{incomeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCOME_AMOUNT = #{incomeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMPORT_NO = #{importNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INCOME_BELONG_DAY = #{incomeBelongDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FIN_CASE_CODE = #{finCaseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIN_CODE = #{finCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_CHANGE = #{isChange,jdbcType=CHAR} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT ISNULL(MAX(IMPORT_NO),0) FROM [sctrans].[T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS] where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND INCOME_ITEM = #{incomeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT count(1) FROM [sctrans].[T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS] where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND datediff(month,IMPORT_TIME,getdate())>0;

SELECT PKID, CASE_CODE, INCOME_ITEM, INCOME_AMOUNT, INCOME_CAT, IMPORT_NO FROM sctrans.T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS where 1=1
and pkid = #{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and INCOME_CAT = #{incomeCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and INCOME_ITEM = #{incomeItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and INCOME_AMOUNT = #{incomeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
and IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
and IMPORT_NO = #{importNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
and INCOME_BELONG_DAY = #{incomeBelongDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
and FIN_CASE_CODE = #{finCaseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and FIN_CODE = #{finCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
and IS_CHANGE = #{isChange,jdbcType=CHAR},

SELECT
FROM [sctrans].[T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS] where is_change='0' and fin_code is not null and fin_case_code =#{0}

SELECT s.pkid,s.case_code,s.income_cat,s.INCOME_AMOUNT,s.income_belong_day,TSI.ORG_ID as org_Id,s.fin_case_code FROM [sctrans].[T_TS_INCOME_STATISTICS] s left join [sctrans].t_to_case c on c.case_code=s.case_code LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR AS TSI ON TSI.CASE_CODE=S.CASE_CODE AND TSI.SRV_CODE=S.INCOME_CAT where s.income_belong_day is null and S.IS_CHANGE=0 AND ((s.INCOME_CAT='3000400101' and c.CASE_PROPERTY='30003002') or (s.INCOME_CAT <>'3000400101'))
